label: neutral
src_text: That alone kills any advantages that you've described, even if we could agree that those advantages actually existed.
augmented_text: The presence of that aspect eliminates any potential advantages you've pinpointed, provided that we agree those advantages are evident.

src_text: Your analogy of leaving your doors and shit unlocked is so stupid I can't even understand how you made it.

src_text: "Ahh i think you misunderstand the "" safe, mutually agreed place "" concept."

src_text: Please inform me with your enlightened perspective on how we aren't leaders at the university level.

src_text: It was a crazy time, and i hope he left you with some great stories
augmented_text: It must have been a hectic experience; I trust he provided you with some interesting anecdotes.

label: neutral
src_text: So you really have my gratitude.
augmented_text: Thank you for making a difference.

label: neutral
src_text: Nor do I like giving my attention to people that think insulting your fellow man is okay.

label: neutral
